content.query:
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://accbbstore.dfs.core.windows.net/tpchdata/CUSTOMER/*.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]

CREATE DATABASE tpchdb COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8;

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://integraadls.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/CUSTOMER/data_0_0_0.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET',
        DATAFILETYPE = 'WIDEchar'
    ) 
 AS [r]

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://integraadls.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/CUSTOMER/*.snappy.parquet',
        FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) 
    WITH (
    [C_COMMENT] VARCHAR (4000) ,
    C_MKTSEGMENT VARCHAR(4000),
    C_PHONE VARCHAR (4000),
    C_ADDRESS VARCHAR (4000),
    C_NAME VARCHAR (4000),
    C_custkey varchar(100),
    C_NATIONKEY varchar(100)
    )
AS [r]
ORDER BY C_NATIONKEY DESC
